name: Sidewords
description: Grab a cup of coffee and relax with Sidewords. Sidewords is part logic puzzle, part word game, all original. No timers. No penalties. No pressure. Just you and a good puzzle.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 Процессор: 1.4GHz processor Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: GPU supporting DX9 DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 100 MB
